infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: This app uses your location every 10 minutes to securely share your live position with your authorized contacts. This is necessary for real-time tracking.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: We need your location while the app is open to start a secure sharing session and calculate your initial position.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysPermission: Allowing 'Always' access ensures your live location updates can be sent to your authorized listeners every 10 minutes, even when the app is closed.
